name: 3D Speedrun
description:
Ok, This is a game am not proud of...(AT ALL)

its terrible and my excuse is that i have no speakers on my pc and my headphones broke.. plz tell me if there's any bugs.. 

I will make better games in the future

Controls..

WASD -Move

Mouse - Move around to see

F2 - hide mouse

F3 - Mouse appear

(am that bad..)

Side Note: Theres no respawning...you have to refresh the page..
